results.title: A Retrospective Cohort Study of the Association of Inpatient Amlodipine Dose With Renal Complication Rates and Hospital Length of Stay

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on mode of death among patients with advanced heart failure in the PRAISE trial. Prospective Randomized Amlodipine Survival Evaluation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ treatment resulted in a greater relative reduction in @DISEASE_Death_Sudden @DISEASE_MESH:D003645 @@@sudden deaths@@@ (21%) than in @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@pump failure@@@ deaths (6.6%) overall.

Effect of amlodipine on mode of death among patients with advanced heart failure in the PRAISE trial. Prospective Randomized Amlodipine Survival Evaluation. Am J Cardiol. 1998 Oct 1;82(7):881-7. PMID: 9781971

results.title: Influence of the timing of initiating antihypertensive therapy in hypertensive rats with renal failure.
results.text_hl: However, in advanced stage of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ is superior in its renal protective effect.
